00021 
00022 #include "chipstream/DataStore.h"
00023 
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 void usage() {
00027   cout << "cel-to-data-store - Program to put cel files into an hdf5 DataStore representation" << endl
00028        << "  usage:" << endl
00029        << "  cel-to-data-store cels.f5 cel1.cel cel2.cel ... celN.cel" << endl;
00030   exit(1);
00031 }
00032 
00033 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00034   Verbose::out(1, "Making map");
00035   int numProbes = DiskIntensityMart::getProbeCountFromCel(argv[2]);
00036   vector<int> map(numProbes);
00037   for(int i = 0; i < numProbes; i++) {
00038     map[i] = i;
00039   }
00040   Verbose::out(1, "Done.");
00041   Verbose::out(1, "Making datastore");
00042   DataStore ds(argv[1]);
00043   Verbose::out(1, "Done.");
00044   ds.setProbeOrder(map);
00045   vector<string> files;
00046   for(int i = 2; i < argc; i++) {
00047     files.push_back(argv[i]);
00048   }
00049   //  files[0] = "../../regression-data/data/cel/HuEx-1_0-st-v2/huex_wta_cb_A.CEL";
00050   //  files[1] = "../../regression-data/data/cel/HuEx-1_0-st-v2/huex_wta_cb_C.CEL";
00051   Verbose::out(1, "Reading cel files.");
00052   ds.slurpDataFromCelFiles(files);
00053   Verbose::out(1, "Done.");
00054   return 0;
00055 }
